(min-width:768px){.HeroSlider-content-inner{width:50%;text-align:left}}.HeroSlider-heading{font-size:41px;font-size:2.5625rem;line-height:1.07;margin-bottom:16px;font-weight:700;color:inherit}.HeroSlider-desc{font-size:24px;font-size:1.5rem;line-height:1.33;margin-bottom:32px}.HeroSlider-desc-secondary{margin-top:32px;margin-bottom:0}.HeroSlider-desc-price{display:none;position:absolute;right:16px;bottom:16px}.HeroSlider-desc-price-text{font-size:19px;font-size:1.1875rem;line-height:1.47;padding-right:16px;text-align:right}.HeroSlider-desc-price-value{font-size:34px;font-size:2.125rem;line-height:1.18;display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-align:center;-webkit-align-items:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center;-webkit-box-pack:center;-webkit-justify-content:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center;width:96px;height:96px;border-radius:50%;font-weight:700;letter-spacing:-.05em;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.6)}@media p{line-height:inherit}</style>\n    <script>\n    function onStylesheetLoad(linkEl) {\n      function listener() {\n        if (/^(?:interactive|complete)$/.test(document.readyState)) {\n          document.removeEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', listener);\n          linkEl.rel='stylesheet';\n        }\n      };\n      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', listener);\n      listener();\n    }\n    </script>\n    \n    <link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"https://www.f-cdn.com/assets/css/flux/base-2da39d45.css\" as=\"style\" onload=\"onStylesheetLoad(this)\">\n    \n    <link none;\">\n                <strong>Email sent!</strong> If the email address you entered is registered at Freelancer,\n                you'll receive an email with instructions on how to set a new password.\n            </div>\n        </form>\n        <div class=\"hr\"></div>\n        <p class=\"HomepageAuth-footer\">\n            Don't have an account?\n            <a href=\"#\" now!\n            </a>\n        </p>\n    </div>\n</section>\n\n        <section id=\"signup\" class=\"HomepageAuth \">\n    <div class=\"HomepageAuth-inner\">\n        <h2 type=\"text/javascript\">\n  var _gaq = _gaq || [];\n  _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-223765-6']);\n\n  var path = null;\n  if (typeof location === \"object\") {\n    path = location.pathname;\n  }\n\n\n\n\n\n  \n    \n      _gaq.push(['_trackPageview', '/pinterest-homepage']);\n    \n  \n  \n\n\n\n(function() {\n  var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;\n  ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'stats.g.doubleclick.net/dc.js';\n  var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);\n})();\n</script>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n(function() {\ndocument.addEventListener(\"DOMContentLoaded\", function(event) {\n  //trackSocial\n      \n\n});\n})();\n</script>\n\n    <!-- Google Code for Remarketing Tag -->\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n\n    if ((typeof window.usertype != 'undefined') && (window.usertype != '')) {\n       loadGARemarketingPixel(window.usertype);\n    }\n\n    function loadGARemarketingPixel(usertype) {\n        if (!document.getElementById('remarketingPixel')) {\n            var google_tag_params = google_tag_params || {};\n            var trackUrl = \"https://www.googleadservices.com/pagead/conversion/viewthroughconversion/1015002772/\";\n            var params =  \"?value=0&guid=ON&script=0&remarketing_only=true\";\n            params = params + '&usertype=' + usertype;\n            var img = document.createElement(\"img\");\n            img.id = 'remarketingPixel'\n            img.src = trackUrl + params;\n            document.body.appendChild(img);\n        }\n    }\n</script>\n<noscript>\n    &lt;div style=\"display:inline;\"&gt;\n        &lt;img height=\"1\" width=\"1\" style=\"border-style:none;\" alt=\"Freelancer Remarketing Tag\"\n            src=\"//googleads.g.doubleclick.net/pagead/viewthroughconversion/1015002772/?value=0&amp;amp;guid=ON&amp;amp;script=0\"/&gt;\n style=\"display:none;visibility:hidden\"&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</noscript>\n<script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':\nnew Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var
